reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN Super Slim Digital Led Dimmer Switch with Air Gap Power Cut Off Switch, 3 Button Control, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Dimmer, Screwless Wallplate Included, ETL Listed, White
reviews.text: I installed this in our commode room. Great for dimming low at night for those middle of the night bathroom trips. You can make it as bright or dim as you wish. This replaces a much more expensive dimmer switch that had a slide control. The knob ultimately broke off, rendering the previous dimmer useless. The instructions are very helpful and it is very easy to install (although, being the daughter of an electrician probably helped me).
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2024
reviews.title: Several brightness levels

reviews.text: I bought two about a year and half ago and they are still working perfectly. One controls a five light chandelier and the other four recessed over the counter lights, both in the kitchen. No flicker. Lights can get very dim at the lowest settings which is nice.

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN Super Slim Digital Led Dimmer Switch with Air Gap Power Cut Off Switch, 3 Button Control, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Dimmer, Screwless Wallplate Included, ETL Listed, White
reviews.text: I am changing my review from 1 star to 5 stars. The seller noticed my initial review and offered to send a replacement dimmer. It arrived promptly and I just installed it. The dimmer now works perfectly and operates just I hoped it would. The new dimmer included all required hardware and printed instructions while the first one did not, so it seems the first one I got from Amazon was likely a returned unit that was defective and incomplete. The second one was fine and works well. I appreciate the seller's concern and I now take back my initial review. I am quite satisfied.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.title: second time a charm

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN Super Slim Digital Led Dimmer Switch with Air Gap Power Cut Off Switch, 3 Button Control, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Dimmer, Screwless Wallplate Included, ETL Listed, White
reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 3 way rocker switch. The switch looks nice and elegant. Both the power switch and dimming controls are push buttons. There is a bank of small LEDs to show the dimming level (8 altogether). The tactile response of the push buttons are crisp, but the dimming electronics is not super responsive. One needs to keep the button pressed for a second or so to change the dimming level. The maximum and minimum brightness can be adjusted since different LED bulbs respond differently. I used the switch to control a linear pendant dining table light with 4 bulbs. I put in LED bulbs from two brands, and their brightness are not the same at the low setting. Installation of the switch is not as straightforward as a mechanical 3-way switch. The way the switch works is not just cutting on or off electricity supply to the bulb. First of all, it needs active and neutral lines to power the electronics. Secondly, it uses the other 3-way rocker switch only as a digital logical gate to control the electronics in the dimmer switch and not to cut power on/off to the load. The installation therefore requires that you know which of the two switches in your circuit connects to the line (power source), and which connects to the load (to the light). You also need to be able to identify the two separate traveller 1 and 2 wires between the 3-way switches. The instructions are clear (available online) but you need to be able to follow the directions correctly. If you plan to do it yourself but are uncomfortable with such installation, this switch is not for you. I have the switch in for 3 weeks and it had been working flawlessly. My wife loves the aesthetic. I read here that some people have issues with the switch failing after a couple of months. I will update this review if it happens to me as well. But so far, I have no problem and like the build and versatility of the switch.
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada on July 15, 2024
reviews.title: Elegant 3-way dimmer switch, read installation instructions before buying if this is for you to DIY
